inclusion.criterion: Children ages 3-12 years at seizure onset
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: EEG with confirmed 3/second spike-wave discharges, usually with hyperventilation
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Previous treatment with any anticonvulsant drug
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Previous use of a ketogenic dietary therapy for epilepsy or any other condition
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Metabolic disorder known that would preclude dietary therapy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Dietary restrictions for which a high fat, low carbohydrate diet would be precluded.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prior history of epilepsy (febrile seizures allowed)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Unwilling to consent to study procedures or return for visits
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, and epilepsy. He was recently tapered off Dilantin, which may have contributed to his current seizure activity.
